product_name: MSR Evo Modular Snowshoe Flotation Tails - 6"
long_description: Evo Modular Flotation Tails add 6 in. of on-demand flotation to any MSR Evo snowshoe. Simply slide them on and twist down the adjustment knob for float in deep snow, or when carrying a heavy pack.
short_description: Evo Modular Flotation Tails add 6 in. of on-demand flotation to any MSR Evo snowshoe. Simply slide them on and twist down the adjustment knob for float in deep snow, or when carrying a heavy pack.
